title: MCPC+1.7.2服务器无法进入（也无法在后台输入指令）
author: lovekasumi
txt_content:
昨天还好好的，今天服务器突然不能进入了，怎么办啊？求大大们帮忙。我找到了以下几条：
[12:41:23] [Server thread/INFO] [eplus]: Initializing Cofigurations.
[12:41:23] [Thread-8/INFO] [eplus]: Starting version check thread
[12:41:23] [Server thread/INFO] [eplus]: Plugin loaded: ThaumcraftPlugin
[12:41:23] [Server thread/INFO] [eplus]: Plugin loaded: Treecapitatior
[12:41:23] [Server thread/INFO] [eplus]: Plugin loaded: TConPlugin
[12:41:23] [Server thread/INFO] [eplus]: Plugin initialized in PreInit... ThaumcraftPlugin
[12:41:23] [Server thread/INFO] [eplus]: Plugin initialized in PreInit... Treecapitatior
[12:41:23] [Server thread/ERROR] [eplus]: Can not load /assets/eplus/lang/langs.txt
请问这是什么意思？（我一点也看不懂的）

现在我在后台输入指令时，不管输入什么他都显示没有这个指令。

例如：
help
Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.
?
Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.
/help
Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.
/?
Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.

怎么办啊？求大大们帮忙。
